actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to encourage the establishment of an International Grain Exporting Stabilization Commission.
short_title: International Wheat Exporting Commission Act of 1979

summary.text: International Wheat Exporting Commission Act of 1979 - Requests the President to take action to establish an International Wheat Exporting Commission which would establish an annual minimum world market price for wheat and prescribe export quotas. Requires the President to keep Congress informed about the establishment of such Commission and to report annually once such Commission is established.

titles.title: International Wheat Exporting Commission Act of 1979
A bill to encourage the establishment of an International Grain Exporting Stabilization Commission.
